author: Nikman Shah
content:
I use Maybank Amex credit card as well and confirm not an issue; my credit card statement already came with a charge towards Netflix.

I've also heard other people using Maybank and CIMB debit cards. Or CIMB Kwik savings account.

A Smart DNS works. He's using UnoDNS (aka Unotelly). I'm using Getflix. And there are countless other smart DNS services available out there for you to try and subscribe. I use Getflix because it is oh so very cheap, at just USD3.99 a month. It could be even cheaper when you combine it with the recurring promotional discounts they have.
